thread.title: Silicon Valley Faces Balancing Act Between White House Criticism and Engagement - WSJ
thread.title_full: Silicon Valley Faces Balancing Act Between White House Criticism and Engagement - WSJ

author: Jack Nicas
title: Silicon Valley Faces Balancing Act Between White House Criticism and Engagement - WSJ
text:
As he and other technology executives were voicing concern over the weekend about President Donald Trump’s immigration order, Elon Musk also asked the public for suggestions for how to fix it.

“Please read immigration order. [Let me know] specific amendments,” read a post Sunday on the Tesla Motors Inc. chief executive’s Twitter account. Mr. Musk added that he intended to recommend changes to the policy as a member of a White House... RELATED VIDEO Many of Wall Street's top executives and companies are criticizing President Donald Trump's immigration ban, saying it hampers competitiveness and counters their values. WSJ's Lee Hawkins explains. Photo: Evan Vucci/Associated Press To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
